original_title: The Last Temptation of Bible Boy
overview: A group of Christian camp counselors unwittingly unleashes an ancient evil that's got an appetite for human souls. Can the morally devout Bible Boy overcome his inner fears to save his friends? Or will they all meet a wickedly unholy demise? SOVHORROR is pleased to present Joseph Voegele and Jon Stone's divine horror comedy The Last Temptation of Bible Boy hosted by the sultry Natasha Nighty.
title: The Last Temptation of Bible Boy
